terms.translation: 보조 손실 없는 부하 분산 전략
terms.context: Specific method for managing mixture-of-experts load balancing without auxiliary loss; referenced in model specifications table
terms.notes: Standard ML terminology in Korean. 'Auxiliary' = 보조, 'loss' = 손실, 'load balancing' = 부하 분산, 'strategy' = 전략

terms.source: Tilelang: A composable tiled programming model
terms.translation: Tilelang: 합성 가능한 타일 프로그래밍 모델
terms.context: Programming framework for AI systems; appears in bibliography
terms.notes: Keep proper noun 'Tilelang' as per context guidelines. Translate descriptive elements: 'composable' = 합성 가능한, 'tiled' = 타일, 'programming model' = 프로그래밍 모델

terms.source: Muddformer: Breaking residual bottlenecks in transformers via multiway dynamic dense connections
terms.translation: Muddformer: 다중 경로 동적 조밀 연결을 통한 트랜스포머의 잔차 병목 극복
terms.context: Related transformer architecture approach using multiway dynamic dense connections; bibliography reference
terms.notes: Keep proper noun 'Muddformer'. Translate descriptive part: 'breaking' = 극복, 'residual bottlenecks' = 잔차 병목, 'via' = 통한, 'multiway dynamic dense connections' = 다중 경로 동적 조밀 연결

terms.source: Aggregated residual transformations for deep neural networks
terms.translation: 심층 신경망을 위한 집계된 잔차 변환
terms.context: Core technique for combining residual connections; fundamental reference to architecture design
terms.notes: Standard technical terminology. 'Aggregated' = 집계된, 'residual' = 잔차, 'transformations' = 변환, 'deep neural networks' = 심층 신경망

terms.source: Residual: Transformer with dual residual connections
terms.translation: Residual: 이중 잔차 연결을 가진 트랜스포머
terms.context: Transformer variant using dual residual connections; architectural comparison reference
terms.notes: Keep proper noun 'Residual'. Translate descriptive part: 'dual' = 이중, 'residual connections' = 잔차 연결, 'transformer' = 트랜스포머 (transliterated, standard in Korean)

terms.context: Technique for combining outputs from multiple layers; referenced in context of residual architectures
terms.notes: Technical architecture term. 'Deep' = 심층, 'layer' = 계층, 'aggregation' = 집계

terms.source: HellaSwag: Can a machine really finish your sentence?
terms.translation: HellaSwag: 머신이 정말 당신의 문장을 완성할 수 있을까?
terms.context: Benchmark dataset for evaluating language model commonsense reasoning; appears in bibliography
terms.notes: Keep proper noun 'HellaSwag' (dataset name). Translate descriptive title: 'Can a machine really' = 머신이 정말, 'finish' = 완성할 수 있을까

terms.context: Normalization technique used in model specifications with epsilon value 1e-20; standard in modern LLMs
terms.notes: Keep acronym RMSNorm. Translate full term: 'Root mean square' = 제곱 평균 제곱근, 'layer normalization' = 계층 정규화 (or 층 정규화)

terms.context: Core architectural component discussed throughout; appears in model specifications and appendix context
terms.notes: As per context guidelines, keep English descriptor with Korean translation. This is transliteration + translation approach: 'Hyper-connections' = 하이퍼 연결, abbreviated as (HC)

terms.context: Algorithm for optimizing doubly stochastic matrices; used with max iterations parameter in mHC configurations
terms.notes: Per context guidelines, use transliteration for this algorithm name: Sinkhorn = 싱크혼, Knopp = 크놉. This is standard mathematical terminology used in Korean academic literature
